feed.title: Endless
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Starting a Blog
entry.summary: Disclaimer I’ve created this blog to be more deliberate with my meditations and to reflect on what truly matters in life. While it is public-facing, it obviously holds much more meaning to me than you and I apologize for any wasted time on your part. Who I’m an entrepreneur who wants to fall in love with writing again. What A blog for my musings, centered around the random things that g...
